definitions: A deliberate affront or slight: A sudden checking of a cable or rope: A knot, protuberance, snag. To slight, ignore or behave coldly toward someone; to turn down or dismiss an offer; to clip the end off something; to secure a vessel in this manner; to reprimand.
examples: He didn't even get invited for dinner – I hope that doesn't come across as a snub.; The rope snubbed against her boot when she stepped on it by mistake.
synonyms: cut someone cold, cut someone dead; give someone the cold shoulder
